For storage, the phone gets a decent 16GB of internal memory, which users can further expand up to 32GB via a microSD card.

processor: Octa core, 2 GHz, ARM Cortex A57
additionalFeatures: Design and display:The Sony Xperia M5 is a waterproof Android smartphone, which releases you from the worry about the phone getting dirty as you can just rinse the dirt off under a tap, also if you are caught in a sudden downpour the phone remains unharmed. It has a slenderized stainless steel body moulded with zade black colour rounded at the edges. The Xperia M5 features a 5-inch full HD IPS LCD display with a pixel density of 441ppi resulting in a murky picture clarity viewable from any angles. The phone has a button on the right side which gives quick access to the camera, so that you can take pictures in a hurry. %Connectivity and battery:The Sony Xperia M5 is loaded with connective features like 4G LTE, 3G, EDGE, GPRS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, USB port and GPS. The device is powered by a 2,600mAh battery, which the company claims to deliver a talk time (GSM) up to 11 hours 49 min, standby time (GSM) up to 671 hours, up to 12 hours 11 min in 3G, music listening time up to 62 hours 32 min and a video playback time up to 8 hours 2 minutes. It has an extended usage mode which extends usage time by up to 14% after low battery warning.%OS, processor and RAM:The Sony Xperia M5 runs Android Lollipop operating system which gives you access to the latest Android world, where you can download a range of apps and games. For smooth performance, it is loaded with a 64-bit MediaTek Helio X10 octa-core processor running with a speed of 2GHz. The performance is further amplified by an PowerVR G6200 graphics processor and 3GB of RAM.%Camera and storage capacity :The Sony Xperia M5 Android phone is loaded with an Exmor RS 21.5MP (ISO 3200) primary camera with hybrid autofocus for fast and accurate focusing in any situations. Thanks to the wide AF coverage, even objects in the corners of the frame will be in focus. The camera has features like 5x Clear Image Zoom, this allows you to zoom in without compromising the clarity of the pictures, Auto Scene Recognition which can recognises up to 52 scenarios and automatically adjusts the settings, HDR, etc. You can also take videos at 4K resolution.

name: LG G4 Stylus 4G
additionalFeatures: Battery and Connectivity:The Single SIM LG G4 Stylus 4G is fuelled by a powerful 3000 mAh, Li-Po battery that claims to render a decent battery life. Up on the connectivity front, the phone enjoys the support of a bag full of options such as 4G LTE, 3G, Wi-Fi 802.11, a/b/g/n, GPS with AGPS,Glonass, Bluetooth v4.1, NFC, GPRS, EDGE and USB connectivity.%Configuration:The company is offering two variants under this product. The 4G LTE supported model is empowered by a quad-core processor clocked at 1.4 GHz and sits on a Qualcomm Snapdragon 410 MSM8916 chipset. Working along with the processor is a 1GB RAM unit and a Adreno 306 GPU. The entire configuration is very efficient in providing a lag-free multitasking environment. Users can surf the net, stream videos, access multiple apps, all at one go and without any error. The graphic processor also ensures a good gaming ambience. The device sails on the latest Android v5.0 (Lollipop) OS with a patented UX 4.0 interface on the top. The UI also supports Gesture Shot, Knock Code and Glance View.%Display and Design:The new addition to the G4 series comes draped in a Metallic Silver or Floral White chassis which is 9.6 mm thick and weighs 163 grams. The lightweight and the vibrant design of the smartphone makes it easier to handle and looks too good in your hands. As far as the display architecture is concerned, the device flaunts a 5.7-inch HD (720 x 1280 pixels) IPS LCD capacitive multi-touch display with a pixel density of 258 ppi. With a supremely engineered display technology, the smartphone offers a crystal clear viewing experience with good viewing angles and amazing colour production. The display also supports a rubberdium stylus for note taking.%Camera and storage:The LG G4 Stylus 4G bags in great image productivity as it houses a 13MP autofocus rear camera with LED flash and a digital zoom. The camera has features like Face detection, Geo tagging, High Dynamic Range mode (HDR) and Laser Touch to focus . The powerful 5MP front snapper is quite impressive and specially built for the selfie loving generation. The total camera set up scores high even in low light conditions. The internal or the default memory of the device is 8GB and can be further extended up to 32GB with the help of an external Micro SD card.
